snippet: The Fox News Channel has declined to renew its contract with Mr. Morris, three months after he was widely derided for predicting a landslide victory for Mitt Romney in the Nov. 6 presidential election.
abstract: The Fox News Channel has declined to renew its contract with Mr. Morris, three months after he was widely derided for predicting a landslide victory for Mitt Romney in the Nov. 6 presidential election.

headline.main: Fox News and Dick Morris Part Ways
